lines: I just wanted to confirm that flight 51 to LA is on time.
Oy oy.  Has that flight to New York left yet?
Can we switch to that then?
Of course.  It’ll be a 4500 pounds.
Before a show, I always get my axe at Manny’s Guitar in New York City.  Did it for my first show when I was fifteen.  I ain’t stopping now.  Right, love?
I see no reason not to.
